meaningMnemonic: Learner, if you <kanji>see</kanji> a <kanji>thing</kanji>, then it must be <vocabulary>splendid</vocabulary>. You saw it, after all, so of course it's <vocabulary>magnificent</vocabulary>. You only see the <vocabulary>beautiful</vocabulary> things in this world. And that's an <vocabulary>admirable</vocabulary> quality.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You learned them already, so you should be able to read this on your own. Just remember that there is rendaku on こと and it becomes ごと.
